channel.title: Welcome on mfreiholz.de
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on mfreiholz.de

item.title: HumbleLogging
item.description: HumbleLogging is a lightweight C++ logging framework. It aims to be extendible, easy to understand and as fast as possible.

item.title: Qt Advanced Docking System
item.description: Manages content widgets more like Visual Studio or similar programs.

item.title: iF.SVNAdmin
item.description: Web-based GUI to manage Subversion repositories and User/Group permissions (+LDAP support).

item.title: TS3VIDEO
item.description: A free and easy to use video conferencing plugin for Teamspeak 3.

item.title: TS3VIDEO
item.description: The project has been moved to GitHub: Sources Release Downloads Documentation (Wiki)

item.title: Lenovo Thinkpad Camera Not Working
item.description: I ran into a problem with Lenovo Thinkpad T470p, but it also happens on some other models. It didn’t let me use the Integrated Webcam on Windows 10 anymore. Luckily I found the fix!

item.title: Network Protocol Parsing with C++
item.description: I’ve implemented a lot of network protocols lately, for work and private projects. I’d like to show you the basic implementation I mostly use and has been proven to be very resource friendly, fast and stable.

item.title: Support Me / Donate
item.description: English You like my stuff and would like to support me? What will I do with your support? Finance public servers Hardware and software improvements Probably also some private fun stuff xD Thank you. German Dir gefällt was ich mache und möchtest mich unterstützen? Was ich mit deiner Unterstützung anstelle? Finanzierung von öffentlichen Servern Hardware und Software verbesserungen Vermutlich auch das eine oder andere private an dem ich Spaß habe xD Vielen Dank

item.title: How to use GeoServer / GeoWebCache with NASA WorldWind
item.description: I currently develop and setup different software products which needs to display a map, like Google Maps or OpenStreetMaps. One very important requirement is to display the Map without an active internet connection. This quickly results in the idea to run my own GeoServer instance with local stored map data and distribute it via WMS (Web Map Service).

item.title: Manage And Deploy Static Websites (Hugo)
item.description: I use static websites based on Hugo since quite a while now. They are fast, nice to edit with the editor of my choice and can be served from any HTTP server. There are no requirements like PHP, Python or MySQL. Unfortunately I never got used to the deployment process.

item.title: Make a class thread safe C++
item.description: You might have come across the case, that you had a simple class which got the new requirement to be thread-safe for upcoming use-cases. I have seen developers who simple wrapped all methods with a locked mutex, like this:

item.title: Development Break Summer 2016
item.description: Some people may wonder why there aren’t any updates on my projects during the last few weeks. Well, a few things changed in my life and that’s why I don’t have a lot of time or motivation. So I decided to make a complete break for this summer until September. I will monitor and maintain all running services (public servers, …), of course. See you later :P

Steuernummer: 103/218/10271 Datenschutzerklärung Datenschutz Die Betreiber dieser Seiten nehmen den Schutz Ihrer persönlichen Daten sehr ernst. Wir behandeln Ihre personenbezogenen Daten vertraulich und entsprechend der gesetzlichen Datenschutzvorschriften sowie dieser Datenschutzerklärung. Soweit auf unseren Seiten personenbezogene Daten (beispielsweise Name, Anschrift oder E-Mail-Adressen) erhoben werden, erfolgt dies, soweit möglich, stets auf freiwilliger Basis.

item.title: Switch to NGINX and Hugo
item.description: I decided to make some changes to my current root server and websites. I already migrated most of my websites to be statically generated with Hugo.

item.title: TS3VIDEO release 0.7, 0.8
item.description:
The new v0.6 is out and available for download.

Download here: https://mfreiholz.de/ts3video/

Most changes are internal and don’t change the user experience, but there is one new great feature: Streaming in a resolution of your choice (HD!)

item.title: TS3VIDEO release 0.6
item.description: Yesterday I tried to release version 0.6, which was a disaster in my opinion. Unfortunately a few users had problems and that’s why I decided to rollback to 0.5 within an hour of release before too many of you upgraded.
